messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1176
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/28/01 3:12:37 AM Mountain Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/28/01 3:12:37 AM Mountain Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< ??? He just said that the xrays show arthritis forming. He is an
orthopaedic surgeon and is requesting a 2nd opinion and a nerve test because
he can find no reason for the rest of the pain in my hand. It is very
intense in the area he "sees" the arthritis (I don't know what I'm looking
at) but the pain extends half way up my forearm and to my knuckles. He says
this is not characteristic of arthritis. All this started when an airbag
exploded while I was holding the steering wheel. THANKS FOR ALL THE
SUGGESTIONS. ambersand >>

I would also try acupuncture and cranial sacral work.

NICKI~

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1176
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/28/01 3:12:37 AM Mountain Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/28/01 3:12:37 AM Mountain Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Juli,
I just had to say, you crack me up girl! And bravo to
you for being so damned honest and not pulling your
punches for the sake of convention. It's refreshing
to hear a grownup actually CUSS! (gasp) on a mailing
list. Most people (including me) are usually afraid
to offend. As to your questions for the editor, YOU
GO GIRL!

Nanci K.
>>

I actually wanted to start a list where us mamas could swear at free
will. I watch my mouth constantly and it builds up. I need to get it out it
is such a release for me.

NICKI~ whose dd has a bit of a colorful vocab. ;o) (2 of which come from
dh, who will never own up to it, he blames me totally)
